verbs.description: [ARG0: The shady cases of President Donal Trump 's personal lawyer] [V: keep] [ARG1: coming to surface] . A new report published by Rolling Stone revealed that Michael Cohen worked as a personal injury lawyer covering clients who allegedly staged car accidents in order to sue for large sums of money .
